message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn to be fair, Alice.  I propose a 52/48 split. This accounts for the fact that I'll be losing potential gains by passing on your offer.
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous with 58-42.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer - it's close to my last one but factors in another round of inflation. Let's be sensible and end this.
